Body: I'm using HTC desire HD with sense UI.  Lately my wallpaper is being changed by the system at random (the images are some random scenery). I have checked all the recent apps I have installed, all from Google Android Market, nothing from unauthorized source. I'm suspecting It could be some malware.Is there any way to check which process is changing the wallpaper?Any malware check tool I can use to diagnose this problem?
Title: Wallpaper changing randomly
